necessary.title: Necessary
necessary.description: Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: Statistic cookies help website owners to understand how visitors interact with websites by collecting and reporting information.

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.description: Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers.

meta.title: Community Values | Balance Botanica
meta.description: Our community values and guidelines for respectful interaction at Balance Botanica

community_values.title: This is a Space of Mutual Respect

garden.title: Community as a Shared Garden
garden.paragraph1: Please treat our community with the same respect you would a public garden. We, too, are a shared space ‚Äî a place to nurture wellness, knowledge, and meaningful connections through authentic conversation and support.
garden.paragraph2: These are not rigid rules but guiding principles to aid our collective journey toward wellness. They exist to help us maintain a kind, friendly place for civilized discourse about CBD, wellness, and natural healing.

discourse.title: Nurturing Positive Discourse
discourse.paragraph1: Help us cultivate this space by always adding something positive to the discussion, however small. If you're not sure your comment adds to the conversation, take a moment to reflect and try again later.
discourse.paragraph2: One way to enrich our community is by exploring discussions already happening. Spend time browsing topics before responding, and you'll develop a better understanding of our shared interests and values.
discourse.paragraph3: The wellness journeys discussed here matter deeply to us, and we want you to engage as if they matter to you too. Be respectful of others' experiences and the people sharing them, even if you disagree with some perspectives.

disagreement.title: Be Agreeable, Even When You Disagree
disagreement.paragraph1: You may wish to respond with a different perspective. That's welcomed. But remember to critique ideas, not people. Please avoid:
avoid_list: Responding to someone's tone instead of their actual content
disagreement.paragraph2: Instead, provide thoughtful insights that elevate the conversation. Share your personal experiences in a way that acknowledges the validity of others' journeys.

journey.title: Wellness is a Personal Journey
journey.paragraph1: Remember that each person's wellness journey is unique. What works for one may not work for all. At Balance Botanica, we honor these individual paths while creating space for shared wisdom.
journey.paragraph2: When sharing your experiences with CBD and natural wellness products, speak from your own perspective rather than making universal claims. Use 'I found...' rather than 'Everyone should...'

trust.title: Building Trust Through Authenticity
trust.paragraph1: Our community thrives on authentic connections. Be genuine in your interactions, honor your commitments, and communicate with integrity. Trust is the foundation of our collective wellness journey.
trust.paragraph2: If you represent a brand or have a commercial interest, please be transparent about your affiliations when relevant to the discussion.

closing.paragraph: By participating in our community, you're contributing to a supportive environment where everyone can explore natural wellness with respect and dignity. Thank you for being part of our journey.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our CBD products and wellness solutions

benefits.question: What are the benefits of CBD products?
benefits.answer: CBD products offer numerous wellness benefits including stress relief, improved sleep quality, pain management, and natural anti-inflammatory properties. Our premium CBD extracts are carefully formulated to provide the most effective therapeutic benefits while maintaining the highest quality standards.

choosing.question: How do I choose the right CBD product for me?
choosing.answer: Choosing the right CBD product depends on your specific needs and preferences. Consider factors like dosage strength, delivery method (oils, capsules, topicals), and your wellness goals. Our team is always available to provide personalized recommendations based on your individual requirements.

testing.question: Are your CBD products third-party tested?
testing.answer: Yes, all our CBD products undergo rigorous third-party testing to ensure purity, potency, and safety. We provide detailed lab reports for every batch, so you can verify the quality and cannabinoid content of your products. Transparency and quality assurance are our top priorities.

spectrum.question: What is the difference between full-spectrum and isolate CBD?
spectrum.answer: Full-spectrum CBD contains all naturally occurring cannabinoids, terpenes, and compounds from the hemp plant, creating an 'entourage effect' that enhances therapeutic benefits. CBD isolate is pure CBD without other compounds. Full-spectrum products typically offer more comprehensive wellness support.

effects.question: How long does it take to feel the effects of CBD?
effects.answer: The onset time varies depending on the delivery method and individual factors. Sublingual oils typically work within 15-45 minutes, while topicals may take 30-60 minutes. Capsules usually take 1-2 hours. Effects can last 4-88 hours depending on dosage and metabolism.

cta.text: Still have questions? We're here to help!

made_in_ukraine.title: Made in Ukraine
made_in_ukraine.subtitle: Proudly crafted with Ukrainian quality and tradition
made_in_ukraine.description: Our CBD products are carefully manufactured in Ukraine, combining local expertise with international quality standards. We source the finest hemp from Ukrainian fields and process it using advanced technology to create premium wellness solutions.

calculator.title: Animal CBD Dosage Calculator
calculator.subtitle: Get personalized CBD dosage recommendations for horses, dogs, cats, and small animals based on weight and condition

benefits.title: Why Use Our Calculator?
benefits.precise: Precise dosage calculations based on your animal's weight and specific condition
benefits.safe: Safe dosing guidelines that follow veterinary recommendations
benefits.personalized: Personalized recommendations for different animal types with appropriate coefficients

disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: This calculator provides general guidance only. Always consult with your veterinarian before starting any CBD treatment for your animal. Individual responses may vary, and professional veterinary advice is essential for your animal's health and safety.

calculator.additional_info: Results are estimates and should be used as a starting point for discussion with your veterinarian

results.title: Recommended Daily CBD Dosage
results.administer_text: Administer {dosage}mg {frequency}. {duration} and monitor your animal's response. Consult with your veterinarian for long-term use.

duration.adjust_as_needed: Start with 2-3 weeks, adjust as needed

general: Choose CBD products specifically formulated for animals
Ensure products are third-party tested for purity and potency
Look for products with Certificate of Analysis (COA)
Start with lower doses and gradually increase
Monitor your animal's response and adjust accordingly
Consult with your veterinarian before starting CBD treatment
tips.cat: Cats may be more sensitive to CBD - start with conservative doses
tips.horse: Large animals require careful titration and monitoring
tips.small_animal: Small animals need very precise dosing - use calibrated droppers

validation.dosage_too_high: Calculated dosage exceeds recommended safety limits
validation.start_with_safe: Consider starting with {maxSafeDosage}mg and gradually increasing under veterinary supervision
validation.consult_vet: Consult with your veterinarian for appropriate dosing
